author: andschwa
body:
The current [Get-Process tests](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/ca1780255ffeb96b9f82ed3068476d85836922a5/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Management/Get-Process.Tests.ps1#L2) are no good and need to be replaced by importing existing BVT/DRTs.

/cc @JamesWTruher @TravisEz13

comments.author: raghav710
comments.body: @andschwa has anyone taken this up? This looks like an interesting task for a beginner like me :)

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan  is managing tests.  @adityapatwardhan Can you answer @raghav710 's question?

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
TravisEz13
comments.body:
Tests needed:

1. get-process -IncludeUserName (requires elevation on windows)
    1. error case, run this as non-admin on windows and verify error
1.  get-process -Module -FileVersionInfo 
1.  get-process -Module
1.  get-process -FileVersionInfo

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan  Are you okay with this being closed?  If not, can you open a new issue?

title: Import Get-Process tests
